title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: When performing the revert operation in the java editor, it takes significantly longer compared to the close and reopen operation.
OB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog.
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor.
5. Observe that it takes approximately 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
